page.title: 13FARMING
page.content: 49 ha run & owned since '47 by K.H. Darch on south facing fields. Keeps 70 beef cattle and 104 ewes - fat lamb. Dairy aspect given up because of milk quota. Farm includes 2.4ha of woodland {Huntacott Fm}172 ha run by Roy Ford. A Ford farm for many generations and known for its roadside duck pond with its accompanying birds. Keeps 65 dairy cows, 100 beef cattle, 300 sheep and 2 pigs. The four farm workers are 'self employed'.{Brookland Fm}Run by tenant, Mrs Plowright. 81 ha - dairy farming. {Beara Fm}53ha with some harwood mostly pastural run by F.E. Ayre (family farm for past 50 years). Keeps beef cattle sheep, pigs, & poultry (eggs). Worked by two men.{Hole Fm}2.2 ha recently purchased by P.R. Pay (neglected in past - part of a larger area sold) - fields are let to neighbouring farm. {Challacombe Fm}40.4 ha run by the
